citances.sentence: 15 Orders for preliminary discovery were made on 17 October 2008: Newcrest Mining Ltd v Apache Northwest Pty Ltd [2008] FCA 1527. It is those Orders which are the subject of the present Application for Leave to Appeal . All submissions as were considered appropriate were advanced so that if leave were granted the appeal itself could also be resolved without further argument. An application made against Santos was discontinued.

1 On 17 October 2008 I ordered that Apache Northwest Pty Ltd ("Apache") give preliminary discovery of certain classes of documents to Newcrest Mining Limited ("Newcrest"): see Newcrest Mining Limited v Apache Northwest Pty Ltd [2008] FCA 1527. A verified list of documents was to be filed and served on or before 30 October 2008.
